posts.title: Why I Finally Started Learning React
posts.description: After years of putting it off, I dove into React Hooks. Here's what surprised me about modern web development.

posts.title: My First Night Market in Bangkok
posts.description: I got completely lost in the chaos and it was perfect. From mango sticky rice to pad thai at 2am.

posts.title: That Time I Got Lost in Tuscany
posts.description: Taking the wrong turn led me to the most charming village I've ever seen. Sometimes the best moments are unplanned.

posts.title: Building My First Real API
posts.description: What I learned from countless Stack Overflow searches and why documentation matters more than I thought.

posts.title: I Tried Making Croissants at Home
posts.description: Spoiler: they didn't look like the photos. But the butter, the layers, the satisfaction? Totally worth it.

posts.title: Three Weeks in Patagonia Changed Me
posts.description: Hiking glaciers, sleeping under stars, and learning to be okay with being uncomfortable.

posts.title: Machine Learning Finally Clicked
posts.description: It took me three courses and a pet project to actually understand it. Here's what finally made sense.

posts.title: Shopping at My Local Farmer's Market
posts.description: I met the people who grow my food. Now my Sunday mornings look completely different.

posts.title: Ramen Hunting in Tokyo at 3am
posts.description: My quest to find the perfect bowl took me to tiny shops and late-night conversations I'll never forget.

posts.title: Island Hopping Solo in Greece
posts.description: Ferries, sunset views, and why traveling alone turned out to be the best decision I made this year.

posts.title: CSS Grid Changed How I Build Websites
posts.description: I was a Flexbox loyalist until this project. Now I can't imagine going back.

posts.title: What I'm Excited About in Web Dev Right Now
posts.description: The tools and frameworks that actually have me pumped to code. Plus what I'm learning next.

posts.title: Getting Lost in Marrakech's Souks
posts.description: The colors, the smells, the chaos. I bought way too much saffron and I regret nothing.

posts.title: My Sourdough Starter Has a Name Now
posts.description: Meet Bubbles. Week one of my bread journey and already I'm talking to flour and water like it's a pet.

posts.title: That Time I Almost Got Hacked
posts.description: A phishing email almost got me. Here's what I learned about protecting my digital life.

posts.title: Chasing the Northern Lights in Iceland
posts.description: Four nights, three false alarms, and one moment that made me cry. Worth every freezing minute.

posts.title: How I Accidentally Became Plant-Based
posts.description: Started with Meatless Mondays. Now my kitchen is full of chickpeas and I'm loving it.

posts.title: Why I'm Finally Learning TypeScript
posts.description: I fought it for so long. Then one bug at 2am made me see the light. Here's my journey.

posts.title: My Tanzania Safari Was Nothing Like I Expected
posts.description: Lions, elephants, and a sunrise that stopped time. Also, camping is different when you hear hyenas at night.

posts.title: Learning to Make Tacos Like My Abuela
posts.description: No recipe, just watching and learning. These are the moments I'll treasure forever.

posts.title: My First Coding Bootcamp Experience
posts.description: Twelve weeks that changed my career. The good, the hard, and the moments I almost quit.

posts.title: Weekend Brunch Experiments
posts.description: Trying a new recipe every Sunday. This week's shakshuka was a game-changer.

posts.title: Backpacking Vietnam on $30 a Day
posts.description: From Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City, street food, night trains, and the kindest strangers.

posts.title: Why I Switched to Linux
posts.description: A month in and I'm never going back. Here's what surprised me most about the switch.

posts.title: My Kitchen Disaster Turned Into My Best Recipe
posts.description: Burned garlic, too much salt, and somehow it all worked out. Happy accidents are the best teacher.

posts.title: Camping in the Scottish Highlands Alone
posts.description: Just me, my tent, and miles of heather. The silence was louder than I expected.

posts.title: Building My Portfolio Site From Scratch
posts.description: No templates this time. Every line of code is mine and I'm stupidly proud of it.

posts.title: I Cooked Through an Entire Cookbook
posts.description: 52 recipes in one year. Some flopped, most were amazing, and I learned so much about myself.

posts.title: Road Tripping the California Coast
posts.description: PCH, fog rolling in, and playlists that matched every mood. My favorite week of the year.

posts.title: My Side Project Actually Launched
posts.description: After two years of 'I'll finish it next week.' It's live, it's imperfect, and I'm so happy.
